name: American Throne
description:
In an alternate history, romance and chivalry sweep across the American continents as kings and queens wage wars for the ultimate throne— the American Throne.

American Throne™ is a virtual book written, developed and published by Codexton™ LLC . 

Features
  • Single, linear plot
  • Clean, minimalist user interface
  • Simple and straightforward controls
  • No dynamic character distractions

American Throne currently contains two chapters. At the moment, we are developing upcoming chapters. 

Developer's Note

American Throne is free for everyone to enjoy, and we plan for it to remain that way. 

Important Note

Do NOT press on any external links.

External links currently do not work for this platform. A popup box warning users they are about to leave the application will always appear before an actual external link can be pressed.

Note on Progress

American Throne Web Player may not save your progress. However, American Throne for iOS will save your progress. American Throne for iOS is coming soon to the Apple App Store for iPhones and iPads.

Contact Us

 For inquiries or concerns, please contact support@codexton.com.
